localised_text.text: Open main unit record in db
Open porthole camera record in db

localised_text.tooltip_text: Click while Dave is open to edit the values for the camera record on the selected unit.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Do(AddRecordInDB(StoredContext("CcoBattleUnit").UnitRecordContext.PortholeCameraSettingContext, MakePair("key", Component("38C044DF-A720-4BA1-AE089AAE5AE91488").GetText), Join(MakePair("distance", this.CameraDistance), MakePair("theta", this.CameraTheta), MakePair("phi", this.CameraPhi), MakePair("fov", this.CameraFov), MakePair("target_x", this.CameraTarget.x), MakePair("target_y", this.CameraTarget.y), MakePair("target_z", this.CameraTarget.z), MakePair("environment_file", "Porthole/advisor/default_porthole.lighting"))), EditFieldsInDB(StoredContext("CcoMainUnitRecord", "C3E4B696-5498-42EB-91B789C4098321AD"), Join(MakePair("porthole_camera", Component("38C044DF-A720-4BA1-AE089AAE5AE91488").GetText))))

localised_text.tooltip_text: Click while Dave open to add a new camera with

callback_with_context.context_function_id: AddRecordInDB(StoredContext("CcoBattleUnit").UnitRecordContext.PortholeCameraSettingContext, MakePair("key", Component("38C044DF-A720-4BA1-AE089AAE5AE91488").GetText), Join(MakePair("distance", this.CameraDistance), MakePair("theta", this.CameraTheta), MakePair("phi", this.CameraPhi), MakePair("fov", this.CameraFov), MakePair("target_x", this.CameraTarget.x), MakePair("target_y", this.CameraTarget.y), MakePair("target_z", this.CameraTarget.z), MakePair("environment_file", "Porthole/advisor/default_porthole.lighting")))

localised_text.tooltip_text: Click while Dave open to add a new camera with the values specified in the camera editor section.
Click while Dave open to take you to this record to edit directly!
Click while Dave open to take you to this record to edit directly! Game supports hot reload of this table too so when export your changes should just appear in game!

callback_with_context.context_function_id: EditFieldsInDB(StoredContext("CcoUnitPortholeCameraSettingRecord"), Join(MakePair("distance", this.CameraDistance), MakePair("theta", this.CameraTheta), MakePair("phi", this.CameraPhi), MakePair("fov", this.CameraFov), MakePair("target_x", this.CameraTarget.x), MakePair("target_y", this.CameraTarget.y), MakePair("target_z", this.CameraTarget.z)))

localised_text.tooltip_text: Click while Dave open to export your values to Dave

selected_context_display.comment: Just fill in the context object and context function to display what information you want about the selected context from the dropdown. Feel free to also add any other children you want like icons, etc that you want to display related to the selected context!

label_context_name.comment: Fill in context object and function to match objects dealing with so can display object. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

list_box.comment: Fill in the context object and context function in order to populate the available list of options for the dropdown menu

template_dropdown_entry.comment: Fill in context object type with what type need to store for diplay purposes and for passing along. Also feel free to change ContextCommandLeftClick to an initialiser or whatever else you want to handle when selecting an entry. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

component_text.text: Select a unit to look at porthole settings!

label_camera_editor.componentleveltooltip: Make changes here to see in real time, then can copy and paste these values back to the db

camera_option.componentleveltooltip: Adds a new record in the unit_porthole_camera_settings table which can then be assigned to a unit record
